data.comment:
not bad for a first run, though it's still pretty bad

i also somehow got orb launch first try by winging it 100%

First run after about 3 or 4 weeks of learning and practice!

Thanks everybody who helped me learn this game :D
My second run, huge improvement, especially on coast and breen. I seriously need to work on my trainstation and canals though. Sub 1:20 real time soon I hope!
bad but still ok

Very nice third run. There's still a lot of places where I can save time though. My trainstation and canals can easily be improved.

Eli and Town were major highlights of this run for me, Eli went by almost perfectly and town was very smooth as well. I saved a lot of time in City 17 too.
Amazing run, and very close to subbing 1 hour in real-time. It's definitely possible with the current route.

found this on youtube and submitted it here to try to categorize older, scripted runs for old engine. -Centaur1um

edit: apparently slYnki is known for splicing runs? i checked the video out, and can verify its legitimacy
so bad
This was pretty awful as soon as I hit canals, that strider at the end of c17 pissed me off but the timesave in citadel was ridiculous.I can easily get sub 1:10
went p good
not sub 1:14 :(

Really happy with this run!

Sub one hour soon?
ay
ay

I did the thing.
You know, that sub 1 hour thing?

Done by a 14 year old, 

Ends at 2 hour 36 mins and 5 seconds (citadel explosion at that time
While I shaved off 40 seconds in-game and 1:30 real time, I can't say I'm super proud of this because of all my INSANE chokes. This run was hella spaghetti and I can easily improve it.
SUB 1

nice
wow

Much much happier with the way this run turned out. I can't believe barney died and caused me to lose so much time, as well as accidentally picking up the grenades over and over in the same place. Still a lot to improve on but I'm getting there :D

This was actually done with a controller plugged into my PC with SPT enabled so I can hold A to bhop. I used parts of the dpad for saving, loading and pausing and unpausing.
Beat my last run. Same thing done with a controller.
So much mistakes and yet a PB. So much space to improve

5th full run. I don't do void clips in my runs and probably never will.
Well...

I'm a starter speedrunner and i said why not give HL2 a go. It's not anything special but im trying. P.S. The video is Unlisted because I am posting It on my main channel that is not related to gaming.
the first 40 min was awesome! until entanglement and c17_04 killed it all :(

First time doing c17_06a skip OpieOP It was actually both the c17_06a and c17_13 skip that saved this run lol I am bad. ROAD FOR SUB 1:13

Absolute a good run ts05 could have been better but who cares we have WR now! :) 

BEST COLLAB EVER WITH RAINTNT, PASHOK, OLE, MEW_, ZETA, RAMA, DEATHWINGUA, CORKYSEK, KYKYSTAS, BLANCO, HOBOKEN AND TRADERAIN. THANK YOU ALL!!!
1st run OpieOP
This is better, aiming for top 5 :)

so it has been almost 10 months now since I got my first pb in half life 2 that time was 1:55 and now I am down to 1:11 OpieOP
the beginning was really not that great but it begins to get better in town and coast but c17 was really fucking good. I would say its a great run but it can be sub 1:10 but its really hard but now we are only 4 secs to sub 1:11 so lets start with that first :) 

Thanks to raintnt for teaching me this game

Thanks to pero for the new prison08 strat that is good and not that rng

Thanks to chili n such for telling me how to get out of the boat and thourgh the wall in canals 11 correctly

This is an absolutely insane run! It's a bit sad to see that I lost a bit of time in prison08 and c17_06a but rest of the run was really fucking insane and I still got sub 1:10 even tho I thought it was over after c17_06a. I am so happy with this run. 
OpieOP
Thanks to:

Pretty solid run I would say. Not really improvable due to perfect late game. I was lucky enough to get a good boatless time for the first time. Absolute trash coast And god-like prison.
ok-ish
god tier breen01

This is a result of over 20 failed runs that never got pass Entanglement. I am very happy of this run even with bad canals_11 and Breen launch.
